title: TURKEY’s STRANGE VILLAGE - ‘Otluk’
description:
For more than a week, I stayed in Otluk, a village in the Afyonkarahisar province of Turkey. Earlier, I had experienced a Turkish village in 2018 in a different province.  The reason I could reach Otluk was my friend Gokhan, who, after hosting me, has now started to host other tourists. #TravelVlog #MountainTrekker #turkeytravel 

How to Contact Gökhan - (local contact in Pamukkale & Otluk Afyonkarahisar) 
1. http://www.otlukvillage.com/
2. https://airbnb.com/h/otlukvillage

If you like my videos, PLEASE SHARE them and let others get inspired to explore this beautiful world. SUBSCRIBE to the channel - http://bit.ly/subscribeMT
